title: PVP.Net PAtcher kernal has stopped working
body:
I am trying to open league of legends however it pop ups and says "PVP.net patcher kernel has stopped working.

A problem caused the program to stop working correctly. Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available. 


Anyone else has gotten this? Any resolution

replies.body: When the patcher launches it needs to have permission to do so, but is being blocked by some setting.  Use our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and launch the patcher!  Let me know if you have any questions.
